10mo ... Roslyn Karamoko is one of the most inspirational partn

what_you_do: Michele Rosenthal is a Trauma Recovery Specialist, Mentor, Speaker, and Author.
who_you_serve: Action-oriented people who are ready to overcome the effects of trauma, including fear, grief, guilt, shame, loss, sadness, anger, agitation, sleep issues, stress, and identity loss.
social_proof: Winner of the Mending Broken Survivor Advocate award, finalist for the WEGO Health Activist Hero award, former faculty member of the Clinical Development Institute for Timberline Knolls Residential Treatment Center.
signature_programs: Books: 'Before the World Intruded: Conquering the Past and Creating the Future', 'Your Life After Trauma: Powerful Practices to Reclaim Your Identity', 'Heal Your PTSD: Dynamic Strategies that Work'.
business_focus: Helping trauma and PTSD survivors overcome the negative effects of trauma and reclaim their lives.
